code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant U as User/Trigger
    participant V as Vault (Sepolia)
    participant RN as Reactive Network
    participant RSC as YieldOptimizerRsc (Lasna)
    participant CB as Callback System
    
    rect rgb(40, 40, 60)
        Note over U,CB: Step 1-2: Trigger Snapshot
        U->>V: triggerSnapshot()
        V->>V: Calculate APYs
        V->>RN: Emit YieldSnapshot Event
    end
    
    rect rgb(60, 40, 40)
        Note over U,CB: Step 3-4: Reactive Processing
        RN->>RSC: Deliver event to react()
        RSC->>RSC: Evaluate APY data
        RSC->>RSC: Calculate optimal allocation
    end
    
    rect rgb(40, 60, 40)
        Note over U,CB: Step 5-6: Execute Rebalance
        RSC->>CB: Emit Callback event
        CB->>V: executeRebalance(newAllocations)
        V->>V: Rebalance funds
    end
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
